mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password_hash, phone, email, introduce, headpic, role) VALUES (#{userName}, #{passwordHash}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{introduce}, #{headPic}, #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT id, username as userName, password_hash as passwordHash, phone, email, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, introduce, headpic as headPic, role FROM users WHERE username = #{userName}
